name: odoo-toolbox
description: TypeScript infrastructure-as-code toolkit for Odoo ERP
author: Marc

scripts.test:matrix: npm run test:matrix:17 && npm run test:matrix:18
scripts.test:matrix:17: cross-env ODOO_VERSION=17.0 ODOO_PORT=8069 npm run test:integration
scripts.test:matrix:18: cross-env ODOO_VERSION=18.0 ODOO_PORT=8018 POSTGRES_VERSION=16 npm run test:integration
scripts.dev:odoo17: cross-env ODOO_VERSION=17.0 ODOO_PORT=8069 SKIP_TEARDOWN=true npm run test:integration
scripts.dev:odoo18: cross-env ODOO_VERSION=18.0 ODOO_PORT=8018 POSTGRES_VERSION=16 SKIP_TEARDOWN=true npm run test:integration
scripts.odoo:up:17: cross-env ODOO_VERSION=17.0 ODOO_PORT=8069 docker compose -f docker-compose.matrix.yml -p odoo-toolbox-17-0 up -d --wait
scripts.odoo:up:18: cross-env ODOO_VERSION=18.0 ODOO_PORT=8018 POSTGRES_VERSION=16 docker compose -f docker-compose.matrix.yml -p odoo-toolbox-18-0 up -d --wait
scripts.odoo:down:all: docker compose -p odoo-toolbox-17-0 down; docker compose -p odoo-toolbox-18-0 down; exit 0
scripts.odoo:clean:all: docker compose -p odoo-toolbox-17-0 down -v; docker compose -p odoo-toolbox-18-0 down -v; exit 0
